meanings.definition: Make as large or great as possible.
meanings.sent1: She maximized her savings by putting money into a high-interest account.
meanings.sent2: The company maximized its profits by increasing sales.
meanings.sent3: The chef maximized the flavor of the dish by adding fresh herbs.
meanings.sent4: The athlete maximized her potential by training hard every day.
meanings.sent5: The student maximized her study time by focusing on important topics.

meanings.definition: Make the best or most effective use of.
meanings.sent1: He maximized his time by creating a schedule for each task.
meanings.sent2: The teacher maximized the classroom resources to engage students.
meanings.sent3: The gardener maximized the sunlight by planting sun-loving flowers.
meanings.sent4: The coach maximized the team's skills by assigning roles effectively.
meanings.sent5: The artist maximized her creativity by exploring different mediums.
